deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@title Sacred Coin Protocol v0.1.0
 @dev A protocol to build an ERC20 token that allows for the creation of guidelines,
 or recommendations on how to use the coin that are intended for the those who interact with it.
 Works in conjunction with an ERC20 implementation, such as the OpenZeppelin ERC20 contract.
 To understand the philosophy behind it, visit:
 https://sacredcoinprotocol.com
 To see examples on how to use this contract go to the GitHub page:
 https://github.com/tokenosopher/sacred-coin-protocol
@dev A string that holds all of the guidelines, for easy retrieval.
@dev An array of Guideline structs that stores all of the guidelines, for easy retrieval.

statements.documentation: @dev creating a new struct instance of the type Guideline and storing it in memory.
@dev pushing the struct created above in the guideline_struct array.

documentation.text:
@dev Function that returns all guidelines.
 This allows iterating over all guidelines for the purpose of retrieval and/or display.

documentation.text:
@dev Function that returns all guidelines.
 This allows iterating over all guidelines for the purpose of retrieval and/or display.

devdoc.details: A protocol to build an ERC20 token that allows for the creation of guidelines, or recommendations on how to use the coin that are intended for the those who interact with it. Works in conjunction with an ERC20 implementation, such as the OpenZeppelin ERC20 contract. To understand the philosophy behind it, visit: https://sacredcoinprotocol.com To see examples on how to use this contract go to the GitHub page: https://github.com/tokenosopher/sacred-coin-protocol

GuidelineCreated(string,string).details: An event that records the fact that a guideline has been created. Because coin guidelines need to be explicitly stated during the coin creation, this event only gets emitted when the coin is created, one event per guideline.

returnAllGuidelines().details: Function that returns all guidelines. This allows iterating over all guidelines for the purpose of retrieval and/or display.

returnSingleGuideline(uint256).details: Function that returns a single guideline. The element at location 0 of the array will store the guideline summary. The element at location 1 of the array will store the guideline itself.

guidelines.details: An array of Guideline structs that stores all of the guidelines, for easy retrieval.

mergedGuidelines.details: A string that holds all of the guidelines, for easy retrieval.

devdoc.title: Sacred Coin Protocol v0.1.0
